body.name: Lingito Bulk Travel Toothbrush, Folding, Built in Toothbrush Cover, Individually Wrapped, Camping, Hiking (25 Pack Medium)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ✅BRIGHTEN UP YOUR SMILE: Each toothbrush is made with medium bristles that are safe for adults and children. Prevent cavities, strengthen your gums and promote a healthy brushing routine for your kids.

✅NO MORE DAMAGE TO GUMS: Our bristles are made soft to the touch to prevent any damage from being done to the enamel of your teeth when removing plaque. Brush away & feel the difference with our medium strength bristles.
✅ERGONOMIC DESIGN: We've made these toothbrushes with you in mind - The ergonomic shape and soft handle will make brushing enjoyable for you again!
✅PORTABLE & FOLDABLE: Prevent your toothbrush from exposure to all sorts of bacteria, our foldable handles keep your charcoal toothbrush clean, and far away from germs!

✅25-PACK BULK FAMILY PACK: No need to look any further, with our travel toothbrushes you can ensure that everyone in the family has a toothbrush with a unique color. That means no more confusion, and best of all everyone’s toothbrush is 100% safe from bacteria!

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #38,090 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #225 in Manual Toothbrushes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What's Included? Travel Toothbrush (25 Pack) made with an on the go folding feature & medium bristles. Features: Take your toothbrush with you on the go with our convenient folding feature to keep your toothbrush clean and away from bacteria!Medium bristles with an ergonomic handle make it enjoyable to brush your teeth and it helps prevent any damage being done to your enamel or gums.25 Pack of Toothbrushes so everyone in the family has one to use for traveling or whenever out and about.

TRAVEL DESIGN You will receive 25 firm toothbrushes easily fits your pocket, purse, office desk drawer, travel toothbrush kit, and toiletries bag. Our medium bristle toothbrush has a slender design that is supple, which can pierce the deepest part of your teeth fight tartar, plaque and other particles. These manual toothbrushes can clean your teeth deeply without damaging or hurting your sensitive gums. DENTIST RECOMMENDED This foldable toothbrush has been clinically recommended for its effective cleaning, plaque removal, and gentle gum protection Prevent cavities, strengthen your gums and promote a healthy brushing routine for your everyone in the family. These toothbrushes medium bristles are also packed that can be easily brought as a travel toothbrush or camping toothbrush. EASILY FOLDABLE Regular-sized brush that instantly folds into travel-size toothbrush in one-flip action. Must-have in your travel toothbrush case. Our manual toothbrushes are designed to be used multiple times, even up to months! Medium bristles are flexible enough to fight and reach particles and other substances in your teeth.

Manual Toothbrush Healthy Benefits: • Using a medium bristled toothbrush will fight plaques and harmful particles from your mouth which makes it healthy. A clean and healthy mouth will prevent the harmful particles from entering your lungs, hence, protecting you from getting different respiratory illness as well. • Medium bristle toothbrushes are recommended by dentists because they are gentle on teeth and gums while effectively fighting particles and plaque. This is a toothbrush medium soft bristle that is useful for both your kids and you adults and is able to brush your teeth and gums without irritation. Hard bristle toothbrushes can irritate gums and cause bleeding. • Medium bristled toothbrushes will not be too hard on your teeth's enamels. Hard bristled toothbrushes will wear away your enamels which will make it weaker and eventually cause you a great amount of pain. Harder bristles will also put an additional force on your teeth, nicking away at the integrity. Toothpaste already contains chemicals that is rough on the teeth, so don’t make it worse by using a hard bristled toothbrush into the mix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I use these in hygiene bags for the homeless. I like them because they fold and take less room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharing is caring
reviews.reviewText: These were a great buy. I bought for a give away. Loved the variety of colors. The bristles were soft but sturdy enough to last for several month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’ll never have to purchase a toothbrush again?
reviews.reviewText: Be mindful of the quantity you’re ordering, you can accidentally purchase bulk and end up like me, with a massive bag of toothbrushes. Hilarity of quantity aside, these are QUALITY. Yeah the head’s a little small, but it’s well built and works great for travel. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holiday gift box perfect gifts
reviews.reviewText: Again perfect gift for Holiday boxes we send out yearly. Great value. Sturdy full sized toothbrush that folds in half, protect brush head. Will be ordering again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for traveling or for guests

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for kids on Halloween
reviews.reviewText: My sons class was trying to stay away from to much candy this year for Halloween. This worked perfect for giving to the class and another parent passed out mini bottles of toothpaste . I’m sure our kids didn’t lake not getting candy but we were happy with no cavities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased various versions of travel toothbrushes from Amazon and in stores. I really like these. They are sturdy, and are not flimsy. I like the way it folds into its storage area. I bought these for a care bag project, but also kept some for myself as I like to change my toothbrush out every few months. I recommend these toothbrushes. Good value and good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought them for a party for Dental school, and everyone loved them with their vibrant colors and how small they became when they folded closed! Another plus is they come individually wrapped in clear plastic.Great for travel, to put for your guests, in AirBNB’s or even as goodie bag stuffers…
Bought for a prank. Went over well. Went on to be very useful..
Soooooo handy for visitors and quick trips. But very much disposable, they dont last past about 10 uses
